website_summaries.verdict: If you have crow's feet, fine lines, or crepey skin around your eyes, this best-selling eye cream is worth considering. Use daily on the delicate area under the eyes for smoother, younger-looking skin.
pros: Formulated to moisturize and plump up the skin around the eyes thanks to ingredients that promote the production of collagen
Absorbs fast and doesn't leave skin feeling greasy
Some users report that it reduces puffiness and lightens dark circles
A little goes a long way
cons: A few consumers with sensitive skin didn't like that it caused a stinging sensation
Also may cause a rash on sensitive individuals

customer_reviews.title: Superb eye cream, keeps the wrinkles away
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for about 30 years and I don't have any wrinkles around my eyes. Tried other creams but no one can compare to Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Resist 24. I hope they keep on making it and glad that it is available on Amazon. Just put a very small amount around the eyes patting it slightly with one finger. It gets absorbed very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Z.

customer_reviews.title: This product is the greatest.
